6.goal: Get a Headshot in Gears of War
steps: Sniper — Simply aim at the head and pull the trigger, unless you're the host, in which case you will need to aim in front of where they're going.
Shotgun — The aim on the shotgun is almost like a rectangle.
Pistol — I'm not sure because I haven't played in a while, but it's either six or seven shots to the head with the standard-issue pistol for a headshot.
BoomShot — BoomShot headshots are possible — don't let anyone tell you they're not but the chance of one happening is about a million to one.

The knowledge of you is unaware of odds of boomshot headshot before and aware of odds of boomshot headshot afterwards.

14.goal: Grow a Rose Bush from Rose Bush Cuttings
steps: Prepare the pot or area in your yard where you plan to plant your clipping.
Take a cutting from the rose bush you would like to grow your new bush from.
Moisten the part of the clipping that you just scraped and dip it into rooting hormone.
Immediately plant the cutting.

20.goal: Make Marshmallow Cream Cheese Fruit Dip
steps: Blend the cream cheese and marshmallow cream until combined.
Pour the mixture into a clean bowl.
Serve with fruit or whatever else you like.
Finished.

32.goal: Make Cheese Sauce with Jalapeño Peppers
steps: First cut the Velveeta in to tiny squares and set aside.
Set the burner on a medium to low setting, before that you begin adding the cheese product.
Wait until the Velveeta has melted lower the heat somewhat and add in the (Rotel) tomatoes.
Add in the Jalapeno peppers, and black olives if desired.
Cheese sauce is at its best if served very warm.

steps: This is the pre-evolution of Wailord.
This Wailmer can be pretty annoying to train, so be patient.
Train it until it evolves.
Go to battle frontier and copy some rare candies.
Give the rare candies to a Wailmer and evolve it into a Wailord using them.

openpi_narrative: The knowledge of wailmer is untrained before and trained afterwards.
The going of wailmer is still before and going afterwards.
The knowledge of wailmer is untrained before and trained afterwards.
The change of wailmer is unevolved before and evolved afterwards.
The evolution of wailmer is wailmer before and wailord afterwards.
The full of wailmer is hungry before and full afterwards.
The change of wailmer is unevolved before and evolved afterwards.
The evolution of wailmer is wailmer before and wailord afterwards.
The action of wailmer is without rare candies before and now holder of rare candy afterwards.
The location of battle frontier location is unattained before and now attained afterwards.
The items of candy is uncopied before and copied afterwards.
The action of ball is unused before and used afterwards.

wailmer.input: The evolution of wailmer is wailmer before and wailord afterwards.
raw-output: The size of the Pokemon is smaller before as a Wailmer, and larger after evolving into a Wailord. Another way to describe it is "The appearance of the Pokemon is different before as a Wailmer and after as a Wailord."

wailmer.input: The evolution of wailmer is wailmer before and wailord afterwards.
raw-output: The appearance of Wailmer is small and blue before and large and blue with noticeable fins on its back as Wailord afterwards. Alternatively, the size of the Pokémon is small before and large after the evolution.
